name: LDJAM 41 - Tharkanys Ivasion - Last Line of Defense
name_original: LDJAM 41 - Tharkanys Ivasion - Last Line of Defense
description:
A mixture of Tower Defense + Shoot'em Up. You control a ship that must fly around and kill enemies to get money to buy towers for adicional defense. Game ends when the generator on the center is destroyed.

Controls:

WASD - Fly the ship;
Shift - Focus mode (Slows ship maximum speed);
Mouse - Aim:
Left Mouse - Shoot;
X - When hovering over the turret platforms construct a turret.

Changelog:

V-0.1: Added [Shift - Focus mode (Slows ship maximum speed);] to the Instruction file. Reason is because I had this implemented in the game but forgot to add it to the instructions within the downloadable files.
